portfolio.title: Student Project Management System
portfolio.description: The purpose of this project was to build a project management application for university students to manage their academic group projects more efficiently and to provide a centralized platform for them to plan, organize, track, and collaborate on their projects. This also helps lecturers and supervisors to track and manage each group easily.

portfolio.title: Maze Game
portfolio.description: The Maze Game project was meticulously crafted with the primary objective of facilitating an immersive learning experience in multi-threading within the Java programming language. This interactive game empowers users with the ability to dynamically expand the grid according to their preferences. What sets this project apart is the flexibility it offers in selecting various types of robots for gameplay. The unique feature of generating an unlimited number of robots until the conclusion of the game adds an exciting element of unpredictability. The overarching mission in this engaging game is for the user to safeguard their citadel from encroaching robots by strategically eliminating them, adding an element of challenge and strategy to the gaming experience.

portfolio.title: Food Delivery Application
portfolio.description: The Food Delivery Application was meticulously developed to serve as a comprehensive platform catering to both restaurants and users. For restaurants, the application provides a seamless process to create accounts and effortlessly publish their array of offerings. This user-friendly interface ensures that establishments can efficiently showcase their goods and reach a broader audience. On the user side, the application offers a convenient and straightforward experience. Users can effortlessly browse through a variety of restaurants, select their preferred establishment, and choose from a diverse menu of offerings. The application's primary goal is to streamline the entire food delivery process, allowing users to enjoy their favorite meals from the comfort of their homes with just a few clicks.
